SELECT a.*, b.price,b.virtual_price,c.`name` as product_name,d.specs_title,d.specs_image from t_flash_sale a LEFT JOIN t_product_price b on a.product_id = b.product_id and b.default_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN t_product_info c on a.product_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_product_specs d on b.specs1_id = d.id and d.stats = '0'
ORDER BY a.create_time desc limit #{start},#{size}

SELECT count(1) from t_flash_sale a LEFT JOIN t_product_price b on a.product_id = b.product_id and b.default_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN t_product_info c on a.product_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_product_specs d on b.specs1_id = d.id and d.stats = '0'
